titleInfo.title: Clarence Brown and Greta Garbo on the Set of "Flesh and the Devil"

mods.abstract: "Flesh and the Devil" tells the story of two Austrian military men, Leo von Harden (John Gilbert) and Ulrich von Eltz (Lars Hanson), who have been friends since childhood. At the beginning of the movie, von Harden meets (and begins an affair with) Felicitas (Greta Garbo). When her husband Count Von Rhaden (Marc MacDermott) discovers them, he challenges von Harden to a duel. von Harden kills the Count, but his superiors send him to Africa as punishment. When he returns, it is to find Felicitas married to von Eltz, who he had asked to take care of her during his absence. von Harden eventually loses control of himself, and the movie ends with a climactic duel between the two former friends.
